<!-- WORD   &   MEANING -->
- mouth  =  spokesperson
- horn  =  ruler
- coat/tunic  =  liberty
- undergarment  =  theft
- nakedness  =  shame
- path  = direction
- tablets  = Old Testament (root)
- Aaron's rod = New Testament (branches)
- manna = Rejected Testament (fruit)
- fruit = legacy
- eating fruit = intimacy
- eat = study
- digest = analyze
- trees = peoples
- nation (s) = man (men)
